title: São Caetano (Chapel of)
body: António de Carvalhal Esmeraldo Alencastre, a nobleman of the Royal Household, and his wife D. Josefa Jacinta Betencourt Correia Henriques, had a chapel dedicated to São Caetano built in 1780, in the area of Terças in the parish of Ponta do Sol, on the estate that they owned and which had the same name as the chapel.

António de Carvalhal Esmeraldo Alencastr: Commissioned the construction of the chapel of São Caetano in 1780.

1780: Construction of the chapel of São Caetano
